title: Natural Hair Loss Shampoo 16oz.
description:
One of your first considerations about hair loss should be what is
in your shampoo and hair care products.

The last thing that you want is more chemicals on your scalp.
Many hair care products can actually cause hair loss. The
chemicals in these can be too harsh and damage your scalp or
follicles over a period of use and leave harmful residue.

Only the purest natural ingredients that are proven to prevent hair
loss and help rejuvenate your scalp and follicles are in this formula.

This gentle natural shampoo restores essential nutrients, building
strength and fullness without weighing hair down. Designed to
cleanse pores and unblock follicles encouraging growth.

title: Just Natural Hair Care Leave-in Conditioner 16 Ounces
description: The chemicals in many conditioners sit on your hair and scalp and eventually may cause problems. Some chemicals do penetrate your hair and scalp. But is that something that you really want? The natural fruit oils, butters and herbal extracts in our natural conditioner will penetrate your scalp and hair to the deliver vitamins, minerals and proteins for beautiful naturally healthy black hair. This creamy natural conditioner for hair is unlike anything that you have ever experienced. With your first use you will see and feel a noticeable improvement.
